data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Song, Zhi-Shun, Bourgoin, Thierry, Liang, Ai-Ping (2011): Review of the Oriental Monotypic Genus Pibrocha Kirkaldy (Hemiptera, Fulgoromorpha, Fulgoridae, Dorysarthrinae). ZooKeys 132: 1-13, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.132.1319, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.132.1319
